label: A2B2C_hP5_164_d_d_a-002
title: Ce$_{2}$O$_{2}$S Structure
comments:
This is the ternary form of the \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B3_hP5_164_d_ad-001}{$D5_{2}$ La$_{2}$O$_{3}$} and the \href{current_web_home_dir/A3B2_hP5_164_ad_d-001}{$D5_{13}$ Al$_{3}$Ni$_{2}$} structures.  We have separated it from the parents because of the large number of compounds involved. 
 Authors after (Zachariasen, 1949) often use CaAl$_{2}$Si$_{2}$ as the prototype for this structure.
